TopicTitle: Command pods cause massive frame drops in VAB

Articles.Content:
I just recently made a large modded install of KSP (1.5) after a long break and the game usually runs fine even with 120 mods. (32gb Ram, GTX 1060, i5 7600k). The problem I'm having now is when ever I'm in the VAB and place down more then one command module, or any other part with crew space, the games frame rate drops down to sub 10. The memory usage maxes out to the point where it's unplayable. 

As far as I know all my mods are up to date and the only pre 1.4.x mods are just part mods.

Log: https://ptb.discordapp.com/channels/408786446535884815/408786446535884818/506911935707611157

Here's the mod list:
